title: The Princess and the Swineherd
description: 1952. First Edition. 105 pages. Illustrated dust jacket over blue cloth with silver lettering. Illustrated by Joan Jefferson Farjeon. Pages remain bright and clear with minimal tanning and foxing. Binding remains firm. 'Eboni's Song' detached but present. Pen and pencil inscription to front free endpaper. Boards have moderate edge-wear with bumping to corners and rubbing to surfaces. Some water staining to spine and boards. Unclipped jacket has moderate edgewear with chips, tears and creasing.
author: Nicholas Stuart Gray
